settings.title: Settings
settings.language.subtitle: Choose the language used in agent reasoning outputs.
settings.language.card.title: Reasoning Language
settings.language.card.help: Language selection applies to future runs. Existing results keep their original language.

settings.language.option.cn.desc: 使用中文输出分析结论
settings.language.option.ja.desc: 日本語で推論結果を表示
settings.models.title: Models
settings.models.description: Manage your AI models from local and cloud providers.
settings.models.tabs.local.description: Ollama models running locally on your machine.
settings.models.cloud.heading: Available Models
settings.models.cloud.error.connection: Failed to connect to backend service.
settings.apiKeys.title: API Keys
settings.apiKeys.description: Configure API endpoints and authentication credentials for financial data and language models. Changes are saved automatically.
settings.apiKeys.loadingHint: Please wait while we load your API keys.
settings.apiKeys.error.loadFailed: Failed to load API keys. Please try again.
settings.apiKeys.error.saveFailed: Failed to save {{key}}. Please try again.
settings.apiKeys.error.deleteFailed: Failed to delete {{key}}. Please try again.
settings.apiKeys.sections.financial.desc: API keys for accessing financial market data and datasets.
settings.apiKeys.sections.llm.title: Language Models
settings.apiKeys.sections.llm.descriptio: API keys for accessing various large language model providers.
settings.apiKeys.financial.keys.datasets: Provides market and fundamentals data for powering the hedge fund.
settings.apiKeys.llm.keys.anthropic.desc: Access Claude models such as claude-4-sonnet and claude-4.1-opus.
settings.apiKeys.llm.keys.deepseek.label: DeepSeek API
settings.apiKeys.llm.keys.deepseek.descr: Use DeepSeek models including deepseek-chat and deepseek-reasoner.
settings.apiKeys.llm.keys.groq.label: Groq API
settings.apiKeys.llm.keys.groq.descripti: Run Groq-hosted models such as DeepSeek and Llama 3 variants.
settings.apiKeys.llm.keys.google.label: Google API
settings.apiKeys.llm.keys.google.descrip: Call Gemini models like gemini-2.5-flash and gemini-2.5-pro.
settings.apiKeys.llm.keys.openai.label: OpenAI API
settings.apiKeys.llm.keys.openai.descrip: Access OpenAI models including GPT-4o and GPT-4o-mini.
settings.apiKeys.llm.keys.openrouter.des: Route through OpenRouter for access to multiple hosted models.
settings.apiKeys.llm.keys.gigachat.label: GigaChat API
settings.apiKeys.llm.keys.gigachat.descr: Use GigaChat models such as GigaChat-2-Max.
settings.apiKeys.security.title: Security Note
settings.apiKeys.security.description: API keys are stored securely on this device and saved automatically. Keep them private and avoid sharing with others.

nodes.portfolioInput.name: Portfolio Input
nodes.portfolioInput.description: Enter your portfolio including tickers, shares, and prices. Connect this node to Analysts to generate insights.
nodes.stockInput.name: Stock Input
nodes.stockInput.description: Enter individual stocks and connect this node to Analysts to generate insights.
nodes.portfolioManager.name: Portfolio Manager
nodes.portfolioManager.description: Generates investment decisions based on input from Analysts.
analysts.aswath_damodaran.investingStyle: Focuses on intrinsic value and financial metrics to assess investment opportunities through rigorous valuation analysis.
analysts.ben_graham.investingStyle: Emphasizes a margin of safety and invests in undervalued companies with strong fundamentals through systematic value analysis.
analysts.bill_ackman.investingStyle: Seeks to influence management and unlock value through strategic activism and contrarian investment positions.
analysts.cathie_wood.investingStyle: Focuses on disruptive innovation and growth, investing in companies that are leading technological advancements and market disruption.
analysts.charlie_munger.investingStyle: Advocates for value investing with a focus on quality businesses and long-term growth through rational decision-making.
analysts.michael_burry.investingStyle: Makes contrarian bets, often shorting overvalued markets and investing in undervalued assets through deep fundamental analysis.
analysts.mohnish_pabrai.investingStyle: Focuses on value investing and long-term growth through fundamental analysis and a margin of safety.
analysts.peter_lynch.investingStyle: Invests in companies with understandable business models and strong growth potential using the 'buy what you know' strategy.
analysts.phil_fisher.investingStyle: Emphasizes investing in companies with strong management and innovative products, focusing on long-term growth through scuttlebutt research.
analysts.rakesh_jhunjhunwala.investingSt: Leverages macroeconomic insights to invest in high-growth sectors, particularly within emerging markets and domestic opportunities.
analysts.stanley_druckenmiller.investing: Focuses on macroeconomic trends, making large bets on currencies, commodities, and interest rates through top-down analysis.
analysts.warren_buffett.investingStyle: Seeks companies with strong fundamentals and competitive advantages through value investing and long-term ownership.
analysts.technical_analyst.investingStyl: Focuses on chart patterns and market trends to make investment decisions, often using technical indicators and price action analysis.
analysts.fundamentals_analyst.investingS: Delves into financial statements and economic indicators to assess the intrinsic value of companies through fundamental analysis.
analysts.growth_analyst.investingStyle: Analyzes growth trends and valuation to identify growth opportunities through growth analysis.
analysts.news_sentiment_analyst.investin: Analyzes news sentiment to predict market movements and identify opportunities through news analysis.
analysts.sentiment_analyst.investingStyl: Gauges market sentiment and investor behavior to predict market movements and identify opportunities through behavioral analysis.
analysts.valuation_analyst.investingStyl: Specializes in determining the fair value of companies, using various valuation models and financial metrics for investment decisions.
